sub_events.description: Pick up the broom, sweep the floor to gather dust, and use the dustpan to collect the swept dust.

sub_events.name: Dispose collected dust
sub_events.description: Pick up the dustpan holding the collected dust, move to the trash can, empty it, and place the dustpan back.

sub_events.name: Final sweeping and collection
sub_events.description: Perform additional sweeping passes to remove remaining dust and collect the final dust into the dustpan.

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Route and connect wiring to a socket, secure and insulate the connections, trim/prepare wires, and attach the cable to the socket.

sub_events.name: Route wire through socket
sub_events.description: Pick up required tools and feed the wire through the socket to position it for connection.

sub_events.name: Secure connections (screws and bolts)
sub_events.description: Use screwdriver and wrench to tighten screws and bolts that fasten the wire/socket assembly.

sub_events.name: Insulate the connection
sub_events.description: Apply insulation tape around the wire connection to protect and insulate it.

sub_events.name: Trim and prepare wires
sub_events.description: Use the wire-cutter to cut and prepare wire ends for final connection and placement.

sub_events.name: Attach cable and assemble socket
sub_events.description: Pick up the cable and socket and insert the cable into the socket to complete the connection.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare nut-filled cracker sandwiches by peeling nuts, assembling them between crackers, pressing them together, and arranging them on a plate.

sub_events.name: Prepare serving area
sub_events.description: Arrange crackers and set up the plate for finished sandwiches.

sub_events.name: Prepare nuts (peeling and staging)
sub_events.description: Pick up knife and nuts from the bowl, peel the nuts (repeating as needed), and move/place the bowl to the worktop for continued work.

sub_events.name: Assemble and plate first sandwich
sub_events.description: Pick up a cracker, place a peeled nut on it, top with another cracker, press the crackers together, and put the assembled sandwich on the plate.

sub_events.name: Assemble additional sandwich(es)
sub_events.description: Repeat the pick-place-top-press sequence to create another nut-filled cracker sandwich.

e435eea1-e4f7-4eef-970e-227152032a08.overall_goal: Prepare and clean a keg: add and pour water, rinse it inside and out, move it between locations, and handle its lid.

sub_events.name: Add water to keg
sub_events.description: Pick up a cup, fill it from the faucet, and pour the water into the keg (prime/introduce water).

sub_events.name: Prepare faucet and rinse keg
sub_events.description: Secure the faucet, fetch and use a hose to rinse the inside and outside of the keg, then close and release the faucet and put the hose down.

sub_events.name: Move keg to shelf
sub_events.description: Lift the keg, carry it to a shelf, and place it there for storage or staging.

sub_events.name: Return keg to work area
sub_events.description: Pick the keg up again, carry it back to the faucet/work area, and set it down on the ground.

sub_events.name: Handle the keg lid
sub_events.description: Pick up the lid, place and tighten it on the keg, then later unscrew and remove the lid (inspection or access).

aa2975d0-9339-4ebf-8f3a-bbdf91bf82ed.overall_goal: Scoop and mix soil into a container to make a soil mixture, inspect it, then reseal and finalize the container.

sub_events.name: Prepare tools and container
sub_events.description: Pick up the trowel and hold the container to get ready for transferring soil.

sub_events.name: Scoop, pour and mix soil
sub_events.description: Collect soil with the trowel from a bucket, pour it into the container repeatedly, and stir the contents to form a uniform soil mixture.

sub_events.name: Set tools aside and position container
sub_events.description: Put down the trowel, release the grip, pick up the container, and place it on the ground for inspection.

sub_events.name: Open and inspect mixture
sub_events.description: Remove the lid, set it aside, hold and inspect the soil mixture inside the container, then put the container down.

sub_events.name: Reseal and finalize container
sub_events.description: Replace the lid, close the container, then pick it up and shake it to finish.

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Mount, secure and fit a wheel and tire onto a bicycle (installing bolts, applying adhesive/patch), then later remove the wheel and dismount the tire.

sub_events.name: Prepare bicycle at workbench
sub_events.description: Bring the bicycle to the workspace and position it for work.

sub_events.name: Install wheel and fit tire / apply patch
sub_events.description: Attach the wheel to the bike, insert bolts, apply glue and a patch to the tire, then mount and fit the tire onto the wheel.

sub_events.name: Secure bolts
sub_events.description: Use a wrench to tighten the bolts holding the wheel in place.

sub_events.name: Loosen and remove wheel from bicycle
sub_events.description: Retrieve tools, loosen and remove bolts, detach the wheel and place it on the workbench.

sub_events.name: Dismount tire from wheel
sub_events.description: Use a screwdriver to loosen the tire from the wheel, then remove the tire from the wheel.

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a motorcycle and scooter: remove and refit a tyre, inspect and clean, and tighten/loosen fasteners as needed.

sub_events.name: Remove tyre from motorcycle
sub_events.description: Pick up and remove the motorcycle tyre and place it aside.

sub_events.name: Refit tyre to motorcycle
sub_events.description: Pick up the tyre again and fit it back onto the motorcycle.

sub_events.name: Secure fasteners (tightening)
sub_events.description: Check for loose screws, then pick up tools to tighten screws on the scooter and bolts on the motorcycle, returning tools to the workbench.

sub_events.name: Inspect and clean motorcycle
sub_events.description: Inspect the motorcycle for loose parts and wipe off grease, then place the cloth back on the workbench.

sub_events.name: Remove fasteners (loosening/disassembly)
sub_events.description: Pick up tools to unscrew and loosen screws and bolts from the motorcycle and scooter, remove and set aside the fasteners, and put tools back.

d4346ac0-ef62-405b-9086-4ee0085af9ab.overall_goal: Install ceiling holders/brackets in two locations using a screwdriver and a ladder.

sub_events.name: Prepare and install first holder
sub_events.description: Retrieve screwdriver and holder from pockets, hold the holder against the ceiling and fasten it with the screwdriver, then stow the tool and climb down.

sub_events.name: Relocate and set up ladder
sub_events.description: Pick up and carry the ladder to a new location, place it down and adjust/position it for the next installation.

sub_events.name: Prepare and ascend for second installation
sub_events.description: Pick up the second holder and stow it in a pocket, get tools/organize gear and climb the ladder to the work position.

sub_events.name: Install second holder and store tools
sub_events.description: Take out screwdriver and holder, hold the holder against the ceiling and fix it with the screwdriver, then release the holder and put the screwdriver back into the pocket.

c9f5958f-ea3f-452e-913d-4f6ede7decea.overall_goal: Prune and remove vine growth, dispose of the cut material, and secure/tie the plant using rope.

sub_events.name: Gather tools
sub_events.description: Retrieve pruning tool(s) and rope from pack/waist to prepare for work.

sub_events.name: Cut and remove vine
sub_events.description: Hold and cut the vine with pruners, pull it out, and carry it to the bin for disposal; stow used rope/ tools as needed.

sub_events.name: Trim plant
sub_events.description: Hold the plant and perform a cutting/pruning action on the plant, then set pruners down.

sub_events.name: Tie and finalize
sub_events.description: Pick up rope and tie the plant (using both hands and the rope), then hold and pull the plant as needed to finish.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Perform routine garden maintenance: remove and dispose of weeds, trim vines, tidy the area, and water plants.

sub_events.name: Initial weeding
sub_events.description: Pull a weed out and set it aside on the ground.

sub_events.name: Vine trimming (first pass)
sub_events.description: Retrieve shears, hold and cut a vine, then stow the shears and release the vine.

sub_events.name: Weed collection and plant removal
sub_events.description: Pick up the weed, move it toward disposal, put it down, then hold and uproot a plant.

sub_events.name: Raking and watering
sub_events.description: Pick up a rake to collect grass/debris, put the rake down, then pick up a hose to water the plant and set the hose aside.

sub_events.name: Vine trimming (final pass)
sub_events.description: Retrieve shears again, hold and cut another vine, and return the shears to the pocket.

99158929-5e0b-4fa5-948c-9791c25cf0ac.overall_goal: Organize and lay out papers and pages on the table, including extracting pages from a booklet and preparing the booklet for inspection.

sub_events.name: Collecting and arranging loose papers
sub_events.description: Repeatedly pick up individual loose papers, straighten/adjust them by hand, place them back on the table, and then arrange them into a group.

sub_events.name: Removing pages from the booklet and laying them out
sub_events.description: Pull pages out of a booklet one by one and place each extracted page onto the table.

sub_events.name: Positioning and opening the booklet
sub_events.description: Put the booklet down on the table, then pick it up and open it with both hands for further inspection.

f0beca54-3ef3-4c5f-a3e3-c10478e624b5.overall_goal: Remove, service and re-install a bicycle pedal, then secure its fasteners.

sub_events.name: Approach and test pedal
sub_events.description: Person checks and manipulates the pedal and moves toward the bicycle to begin work.

sub_events.name: Loosen and remove pedal
sub_events.description: Person picks up a spanner, holds the pedal, loosens and removes the pedal from the bicycle, then places pedal and spanner on the workbench.

sub_events.name: Reposition and tighten pedal
sub_events.description: Person picks up the pedal, brings it back to the bicycle, positions it, tightens it with the spanner and puts the spanner down.

sub_events.name: Adjust fastener and final inspection
sub_events.description: Person uses pliers to remove and reattach a nut on the pedal, inspects the pedal, tightens the nut, and puts tools down.

1cddd647-6aaf-49ed-b09d-922d729453a8.overall_goal: Organize a pile of books by picking each up, inspecting it, and placing it on the bookshelf, using the table as a staging area when needed.

sub_events.name: Direct inspection and shelving
sub_events.description: Pick individual books from the heap or table, examine them, and place them directly on the bookshelf.

sub_events.name: Staging books from heap to table
sub_events.description: Move multiple books from the heap onto the table to stage them for later inspection and shelving.

sub_events.name: Inspect staged books and shelve
sub_events.description: Pick up staged books from the table, examine them, and place them onto the bookshelf.

sub_events.name: Final inspection and shelving from heap
sub_events.description: Handle remaining books from the heap: pick them up, examine them, and put them on the bookshelf.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Prepare a guitar and the music book so the person can play: tune the instrument and set the book on a stand for reading/playing.

sub_events.name: Retrieve and inspect music book
sub_events.description: Pick up the book, open and flip through pages, mark and read it to check or prepare the music/content.

sub_events.name: Pick up and tune the guitar
sub_events.description: Pick up the guitar, release/hold appropriately, adjust and tighten strings, test and hold the instrument ready to play.

sub_events.name: Place book on stand and finalize setup
sub_events.description: Place the music book on a stand, adjust the stand and book for proper positioning, then read the book from the stand.
